President Obama attended a dinner hosted by mega Democratic donors Jeff and Lora Drezner at their sprawling $ 5 million bungalow on five acres in Potomac , Md , on Monday evening , The Post 's In the Loop column reports .
The Drezners gave a combined $ 100,000 to candidates and political committees in the 2012 campaign cycle .

For the bargain price of $ 10,000 per person , or $ 32,400 per couple for VIP status , ( that better be some spectacular filet ) you could enjoy an intimate dinner with special guest Barack Obama , according to the invitation posted by the Sunlight Foundation .
